SEARCH
Package UserSystem

Class HospitalStaffController

Object
HospitalStaffController
public class HospitalStaffController extends Object
The HospitalStaffController class manages hospital staff operations, including adding, removing, updating, filtering, viewing, and saving staff records. It ensures that only valid staff (non-patients) can be managed.
